alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 12:21PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Victoria and central Goliad Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goliad, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Fannin, Schroeder, Coleto Creek Park, Ander, Oak Village, Mission Valley, Weesatche and Weser. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 646. US Highway 59 between mile markers 644 and 676. US Highway 77 between mile markers 582 and 586. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
